pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 2, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 2, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral ceremony in honour of the victims of the attack on the Centre culturel islamique de Québec and will give a short speech.

Maurice Richard Arena
2800 Viau Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for Media:

  • Pooled live broadcast
